about_the_game:
Clarity is a casual platformer. It is not a Metroidvania or Souls like game. Clarity combines the players ability to select what order they fight bosses and the love of exploring expansive dungeons with the aid of a map.



Clarity is a powerful magic that emanates from Demons and their spawn. Once a foe is defeated Clarity is collected to power magic spells. These spells will be needed as you venture into dungeons populated with savage enemies and merciless monsters.



Game Features
  • Classic 2D side-scrolling platform action.
  • Player controls include double-jump, dash, sword attack and spell casting.
  • 7 unique levels and Bosses to defeat.
  • You choose the order to challenge and defeat Bosses.
  • Skills and abilities acquired from Bosses create alternate ways to fulfil your goals and progress levels in different orders.
  • Navigate the world of Vanguardia using your wits and a map.





In the game Clarity, the demons represent mental health and other life challenges that people face. As you travel through swamps of poison and caverns of lava you come across the characteristics it takes for the hero to defeat their demons and find recovery.
